text: Matthew Wolfenden (born 5 May 1980) is an English actor. He is best known for portraying the role of David Metcalfe in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (2006â€“2024). Wolfenden was born in Norwood Green, West Yorkshire. He was educated at Brighouse High School. ==Career== Wolfenden was a member of the British gymnastics squad until, aged 16, he fell whilst practising on the rings and broke his back. This prevented his continuing gymnastics and he turned to acting. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from West Yorkshire
title: Matthew Wolfenden (actor)
